SETTINGS_DESC:
Changes the settings of MintWatch.
You can also open this from the wrench icon in the header of MintWatch.

pmwforcepagehls.name: Force video to be loaded via page script
pmwforcepagehls.hint:
Always loads the video using the page script. (Default for Firefox environment)
It may help if the video doesn't load correctly in some environments, but please disable it if it works fine.

pmwlayouttype.name: Layout of the watch page
pmwlayouttype.hint: Specifies the appearance of MintWatch. Style changes when using Shinjuku.

pmwplayertype.name: Player theme
pmwplayertype.hint: Specifies the appearance of the player used in MintWatch.
